title: Word Power in 15 Minutes a Day-Mantesh

Word Power in 15 Minutes a Day



LearningExpress, LLC 
2009 
ENGLISH
ISBN: 1576856747 
256 pages 
PDF 
12.4 MB


With Word Power in 15 Minutes a Day, students gain an impressive vocabulary in no time! Short, easy lessons and fun factoids drawn from popular TV, music, sports, and movies make learning new words a pleasure rather than a memorization chore. Memory hooks and shortcuts help students retain what they are learning, which includes:SynonymsoAntonyms,Related words and meanings,Vocabulary from a variety of subject areas,How words are used on standardized tests................
